sen.j: 天平勝宝5年（755年）には班田収授法の円滑な実施のため、平城京の左右両京・河内国・摂津国・山城国にそれぞれ4名ずつの算師が任命されたことが記録されている。
sen.e: It was recorded tha in 755, four persons were appointed to the Sanshi post in each of Sakyo (the left-side area of the Heijo capital), Ukyo (the right-side area of the Heijo capital), the Kawachi province, the Settsu province and the yamashiro province, to execute Handen Shuju ho (the law of periodic reallocations of rice land) smoothly.
